interactiveModeTooltip.message: Inspect the CSS selector of the page you are browsing.

shallowSearchModeDescription.message: Searches from the text of elements that matches the CSS selector.

deepSearchModeDescription.message: Searches from the text of elements and its descendants that matches the CSS selector.

emoGuardianFormHelperText.message: Hides elements or strings with the specified emoji.

defaultTargetFormHelperText.message: Specifies the target when this extension is opened.

integrateWithDropboxSecondary.message: When Dropbox integration is enabled, import/export feature will be available.

integrateWithDropboxNote.message: This is a feature to synchronize data between browsers from different vendors (e.g. Chrome between Safari). There is no need to use this feature between browsers from the same vendor (e.g. Chrome between Chrome, Safari between Safari), as the data will be synchronized by the browser's built-in functionality.

enableAutoImportSecondary.message: Continuously imports data that is exported to Dropbox.

exportToDropboxHelp.message: The app data to be exported are CSS selectors, keywords, and EmoGuardian. Also, export must be done manually. You can import the exported data by enabling auto import in other browsers.

autoImportConfirmDialogTitle.message: Do you want to enable auto import?

autoImportConfirmDialogText.message: After enabling auto import, all CSS selectors and keywords set in this browser will be removed, and the exported data will be loaded from Dropbox storage instead. Also, you will not be able to edit CSS selectors and keywords in this browser.

resetRecommendSelectorSecondary.message: Resets the following CSS selectors to their installation settings.

resetRecommendSelectorConfirmDialogTitle.message: Do you want to reset the recommended CSS selectors?

resetRecommendSelectorConfirmDialogText.message: Resets the recommended CSS selector to the settings at the time of installation. This operation cannot be undone.

blockingSpeedSecondary.message: Adjusts the speed at which elements and text are hidden.

blockingSpeedHint.message: The lower the number of blocking speed, the quicker it can be hidden, but the higher the load. Try to balance blocking speed and load to match your device's performance.

enablePowerTooltip.message: Click to enable on this site.

disablePowerTooltip.message: Click to disable on this site.
